title: NFL games in jeopardy after Titans forced to shut down facilities following positive COVID-19 tests (Football 9/30)
description:
The NFL received some inevitable news on Tuesday after 3 Titans players and 5 personnel members tested positive for COVID-19. This had a ripple effect on not on Tennessee's organization but last week's opponent, the Vikings as well as those two teams upcoming matchups versus the Steelers and Texans. Will Brinson is joined by Brady Quinn to break down what happens next. How will the Titans be impacted if they can't practice all week? Will and Brady then examine some good and bad quarterback play from around the league. The good includes Russell Wilson, Aaron Rodgers, Josh Allen and Jared Goff, while the bad focuses on Carson Wentz, Lamar Jackson (just on MNF), Sam Darnold, Daniel Jones and Dwayne Haskins.

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @Brady_Quinn, @E_DeBerardinis
